name: 1 DOT
description:
1 DOT is a super addictive and satisfying fun game.
The rules is very simple. Avoid red dots, absorb blue dots and get higher score!

This is the core rule of this addictive game. Sounds easy?
Give it a try, and see how well you stack up against your friends.

—————
HOW TO PLAY

-Tap to start
-Slide to move
-Absorb blue dots
-Avoid all red dots

Game Play Video at YouTube:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9fzU9NFGuCY
